name: CINEC Campus Department of Aviation
about: CINEC Campus Department of Aviation is a premier institution in Sri Lanka, offering comprehensive aviation training programs. Established as part of CINEC Campus, one of the largest and most diversified non-state higher education institutes in Sri Lanka, the Department of Aviation is approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka. It provides rigorous training in aircraft maintenance engineering, airport ground operations, and airline and airport management, all aligned with international standards such as IATA and EASA guidelines. The department boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including a Pressurised Lear Jet Aircraft for practical training, and is staffed by experienced instructors with multi-national industry experience. CINEC Campus Department of Aviation is dedicated to producing competent professionals who are ready to excel in the global aviation industry.
services:
["BBA in Airline and Airport Management
Certificate In Airport Ground Operations
IATA Airline Cabin Crew Qualification
IATA Passenger Ground Services
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering"]
